trans-unit.source: Note: Named grid areas automatically generate implicit named lines of this form, so specifying grid-column: foo; will choose the start/end edge of that named grid area (unless another line named foo-start/foo-end was explicitly specified before it).
trans-unit.target: 注意：命名网格区域会自动生成这种形式的隐式命名行，因此请指定 grid-column: foo; 将选择该命名网格区域的开始/结束边缘（除非在其之前明确指定了另一条名为 foo-start / foo-end 的行）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Named grid areas automatically generate implicit named lines of this form, so specifying grid-row-end: foo; will choose the end edge of that named grid area (unless another line named foo-end was explicitly specified before it).
trans-unit.target: 注意：命名网格区域会自动生成这种形式的隐式命名行，因此请指定 grid-row-end: foo; 将选择该命名网格区域的末端边缘（除非在其之前显式指定了另一条名为 foo-end 的行）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Named grid areas automatically generate implicit named lines of this form, so specifying grid-row-start: foo; will choose the start edge of that named grid area (unless another line named foo-start was explicitly specified before it).
trans-unit.target: 注意：命名网格区域会自动生成这种形式的隐式命名行，因此请指定 grid-row-start: foo; 将选择该命名网格区域的起始边缘（除非在其之前显式指定了另一条名为 foo-start 的行）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Named grid areas automatically generate implicit named lines of this form, so specifying grid-row: foo; will choose the start/end edge of that named grid area (unless another line named foo-start/foo-end was explicitly specified before it).
trans-unit.target: 注意：命名网格区域会自动生成这种形式的隐式命名行，因此请指定 grid-row: foo; 将选择该命名网格区域的开始/结束边缘（除非在其之前明确指定了另一条名为 foo-start / foo-end 的行）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Negative values are invalid, causing the declaration to be ignored. Some early, prefixed, implementations may consider them as identical to 0s.
trans-unit.target: 注意：负值无效，导致声明被忽略。一些早期的前缀实现可能会将它们视为等于 0s 。

trans-unit.source: Note: No browser currently implements this feature so the following example will not work.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前没有浏览器实现此功能，因此以下示例将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Not all CSS properties apply to all layout modes. Most of them apply to one or two of them and have no effect if they are set on an element participating in another layout mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并非所有CSS属性都适用于所有布局模式。它们中的大多数适用于它们中的一个或两个，并且如果将它们设置在参与另一布局模式的元素上则无效。

trans-unit.source: Note: Not all browsers support every type of image on every property. See the browser compatibility section for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并非所有浏览器都支持每个属性上的每种图像类型。有关详细信息，请参见浏览器兼容性部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: On inherited properties, the initial value may be unexpected. You should consider using the inherit, unset, or revert keywords instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在继承的属性上，初始值可能是意外的。您应该考虑改为使用 inherit ， unset 或 revert 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Note: On systems with multi-button mice, CSS3 specifies that the :active pseudo-class must only apply to the primary button; on right-handed mice, this is typically the leftmost button.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在带有多按钮鼠标的系统上，CSS3指定 :active 伪类必须仅应用于主按钮；在惯用右手的老鼠上，这通常是最左侧的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Note: One of the differences between browser implementations is inheritance. In Firefox, -moz-user-select is not inherited by absolutely positioned elements, but in Safari and Chrome, -webkit-user-select is inherited by those elements.
trans-unit.target: 注意：浏览器实现之间的区别之一是继承。在Firefox中，-moz-user-select不会被绝对定位的元素继承，但是在Safari和Chrome中，-webkit-user-select会被这些元素继承。

trans-unit.source: Note: Only calculated values can be inherited. Thus, even if a percentage value is used on the parent property, a real value (such as a width in pixels for a <length> value) will be accessible on the inherited property, not the percentage value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅可继承计算值。因此，即使在父属性上使用百分比值，也可以在继承的属性上访问实数值（例如 <length> 值的像素宽度），而不是百分比值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Padding creates extra space within an element. In contrast, margin creates extra space around an element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：填充会在元素内创建额外的空间。相反， margin 在元素周围创建了额外的空间。

trans-unit.source: Note: Please see Using CSS gradients for more examples.
trans-unit.target: 注意：有关更多示例，请参见使用CSS渐变。

trans-unit.source: Note: Rendering of color stops in CSS gradients follows the same rules as color stops in SVG gradients.
trans-unit.target: 注意：CSS渐变中的色标渲染与SVG渐变中的色标遵循相同的规则。

trans-unit.source: Note: Run-in boxes were removed from the CSS 2.1 standard, as they were insufficiently specified to allow for interoperable implementation. They may reappear in CSS3, but meanwhile, are considered experimental. They should not be used in production.
trans-unit.target: 注意：磨合盒已从CSS 2.1标准中删除，因为没有足够指定它们以允许可互操作的实现。它们可能会再次出现在CSS3中，但同时被认为是实验性的。它们不应在生产中使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: SVG images have a preserveAspectRatio attribute that defaults to the equivalent of contain. In Firefox 43, as opposed to Chrome 52, an explicit background-size causes preserveAspectRatio to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 注： SVG图像具有 preserveAspectRatio 属性，默认为等效的 contain 。与Firefox 52相比，在Firefox 43中，显式的 background-size 会导致 preserveAspectRatio 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note: Setting one axis to visible (the default) while setting the other to a different value results in visible behaving as auto.
trans-unit.target: 注：设置一个轴 visible （默认值），而另一个设置为不同的值，结果 visible 表现为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Some older browsers (pre-2017) may need prefixes; the live examples you can click to see in your browser include the -webkit prefixed syntax.
trans-unit.target: 注意：某些较旧的浏览器（2017年之前）可能需要前缀。您可以单击以在浏览器中查看的实时示例包括 -webkit 前缀语法。

trans-unit.source: Note: Some properties allow negative <length>s, while others do not.
trans-unit.target: 注意：某些属性允许使用负 <length> ，而其他属性则不允许。

trans-unit.source: Note: Starting with Gecko 2.0 (Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1), Gecko also supports the SVG image format for cursors. However, the SVG image must contain a length-valued (not percentage-valued) height and width on its root SVG node. JavaScript, CSS animation, and declarative SMIL inside an SVG image are ignored; you can't use SVG to create an animated cursor, for example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Gecko 2.0（Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1）开始，Gecko还支持光标的SVG图像格式。但是，SVG图像在其根 SVG 节点上必须包含长度（而不是百分比）的高度和宽度。SVG图片中的JavaScript，CSS动画和声明性SMIL将被忽略；例如，您不能使用SVG创建动画光标。

trans-unit.source: Note: Starting with Gecko 2.0, Gecko also supports the SVG image format for cursors. However, the SVG image must contain a length-valued (not percentage-valued) height and width on its root SVG node. JavaScript, CSS animation, and declarative SMIL inside an SVG image are ignored; you can't use SVG to create an animated cursor, for example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Gecko 2.0开始，Gecko还支持光标的SVG图像格式。但是，SVG图像在其根SVG节点上必须包含长度（而不是百分比）的高度和宽度。SVG图片中的JavaScript，CSS动画和声明性SMIL将被忽略；例如，您不能使用SVG创建动画光标。

trans-unit.source: Note: Support for language-specific cases varies between browsers, so check the browser compatibility table.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不同浏览器对特定语言情况的支持不同，因此请查看浏览器兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: Note: The :optional pseudo-class selects optional form fields.
trans-unit.target: 注：本 :optional 伪类选择可选的表单字段。

trans-unit.source: Note: The :required pseudo-class selects required form fields.
trans-unit.target: 注：本 :required 伪类选择所需的表单字段。

trans-unit.source: Note: The background shorthand resets the value of this property to its initial value if it's left unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 background 速记，如果它不指定此属性的值重置为初始值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The set of properties that can be animated is subject to change. As such, you should avoid including any properties in the list that don't currently animate, as someday they might, causing unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 注：该组可动画的属性是可能发生变化。因此，您应该避免在列表中包括当前可能没有动画的任何属性，因为有一天它们可能会引起意外结果。

trans-unit.source: Note: The grid shorthand accepts the same syntax, but also resets the implicit grid properties to their initial values. Use grid (as opposed to grid-template) to prevent these values from cascading in seperately.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 grid 速记接受相同的语法，但也复位隐含网格属性为初始值。使用 grid （而不是 grid-template ）可以防止这些值分别级联。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Canvas API can provide a fallback solution for crisp-edges through manual image data manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该帆布API可提供用于回退溶液 crisp-edges 通过手动图像数据操作。

trans-unit.source: Note: The getComputedStyle() DOM API returns the resolved value, which may either be the computed value or the used value, depending on the property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 getComputedStyle() DOM API返回解析值，其可以是所述计算的值或使用的值，具体取决于属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The padding property can be used to set paddings on all four sides of an element with a single declaration.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 padding 属性可以用来设置垫衬上一个元素的四边有一个声明。

trans-unit.source: Note: The :blank selector is considered at risk, as the CSSWG keeps changing it.
trans-unit.target: 注：本 :blank 选择被认为是有风险，因为CSSWG在不断变化的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The attr() function can be used with any CSS property, but support for properties other than content is experimental, and support for the type-or-unit parameter is sparse.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 attr() 函数可以与任何CSS属性可以使用，但比其它属性的支持 content 是实验性的，并且用于类型或单元参数载体是稀疏的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The auto setting's behavior depends on the language being properly tagged so that the appropriate hyphenation rules can be selected. You must specify a language using the lang HTML attribute in order to guarantee that automatic hyphenation is applied in the language of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 注：在 auto 设置的行为取决于语言被正确标记，以便相应的断字规则可以选择。您必须使用 lang HTML属性指定一种语言，以确保自动连字以您选择的语言应用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The auto setting's behavior depends on the language being properly tagged to select the appropriate hyphenation rules. You must specify a language using the lang HTML attribute to guarantee that automatic hyphenation is applied in that language.
trans-unit.target: 注：在 auto 设置的行为取决于语言被正确标记，以选择合适的断字规则。您必须使用 lang HTML属性指定一种语言，以确保以该语言应用自动连字符。

trans-unit.source: Note: The border-spacing property is equivalent to the deprecated cellspacing<table> attribute, except that it has an optional second value that can be used to set different horizontal and vertical spacing.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该 border-spacing 属性等效于弃用 cellspacing <table> 属性，不同之处在于它具有可以用来设定不同的水平和垂直间隔的可选的第二个值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The counter() function can be used with any CSS property, but support for properties other than content is experimental, and support for the type-or-unit parameter is sparse.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 counter() 函数可以与任何CSS属性可以使用，但比其它属性的支持 content 是实验性的，并且用于类型或单元参数载体是稀疏的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The counters() function can be used with any CSS property, but support for properties other than content is experimental, and support for the type-or-unit parameter is sparse.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 counters() 函数可以与任何CSS属性被使用，但支持比其它属性 content 是实验性的，并且用于类型或单元参数载体是稀疏的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The font-stretch property was initially defined in CSS 2, but dropped in CSS 2.1 due to the lack of browser implementation. It was brought back in CSS 3.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 font-stretch 性能在CSS 2的最初定义，但是在CSS 2.1下降是由于缺乏浏览器实现的。它被带回CSS 3。

trans-unit.source: Note: The ink value was moved to the text-decoration-skip-ink property.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 ink 值移到 text-decoration-skip-ink 性能。

trans-unit.source: Note: The scale() function only scales in 2D. To scale in 3D, use scale3d() instead.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 scale() 函数只在缩放2D。要在3D中缩放，请改用 scale3d() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The text-rendering property is an SVG property that is not defined in any CSS standard. However, Gecko and WebKit browsers let you apply this property to HTML and XML content on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 text-rendering 性能是没有任何CSS标准中定义的SVG属性。但是，通过Gecko和WebKit浏览器，您可以将此属性应用于Windows，macOS和Linux上的HTML和XML内容。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Chrome browser currently won’t accept some values returned by calc() when an integer is expected. This includes any division, even if it results in an integer. ie. z-index: calc(4 / 2); will not be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当期望使用整数时，Chrome浏览器当前不接受 calc() 返回的某些值。这包括任何除法，即使结果为整数也是如此。IE。 z-index: calc(4 / 2); 将不会被接受。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Media Queries Level 4 specification has reasonable support in modern browsers, but some media features are not well supported. See the @media browser compatibility table for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Media Queries Level 4规范在现代浏览器中具有合理的支持，但是某些媒体功能没有得到很好的支持。有关更多详细信息，请参见 @media 浏览器兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: Note: The W3C is discussing how to handle viewport-related <length> units, vh, vw, vmin, and vmax. Meanwhile do not use them within a @page at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 注意： W3C正在讨论如何处理与视口相关的 <length> 单位 vh ， vw ， vmin 和 vmax 。同时，请勿在 @page 规则中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Note: The behavior of <gradient>s changed in Gecko 8.0 (Firefox 8.0 / Thunderbird 8.0 / SeaMonkey 2.5). Before this, they were treated as images with no intrinsic dimensions, but with intrinsic proportions identical to that of the background positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <gradient> 的行为在Gecko 8.0（Firefox 8.0 / Thunderbird 8.0 / SeaMonkey 2.5）中已更改。在此之前，它们被视为没有固有尺寸的图像，但是固有比例与背景定位区域的固有比例相同。

trans-unit.source: Note: The border will be invisible if its style is not defined. This is because the style defaults to none.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果未定义边框样式，则边框将不可见。这是因为样式默认为 none 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The containing block in which the root element (<html>) resides is a rectangle called the initial containing block. It has the dimensions of the viewport (for continuous media) or the page area (for paged media).
trans-unit.target: 注意：根元素（ <html> ）所在的包含块是一个称为初始包含块的矩形。它具有视口（用于连续媒体）或页面区域（用于分页媒体）的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Note: The counter's value can be increased or decreased using the counter-increment CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以使用 counter-increment CSS属性来增加或减少计数器的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The counter's value can be incremented or decremented using the counter-increment CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以使用 counter-increment CSS属性来增加或减少计数器的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The counter's value can be reset to an arbitrary number using the counter-reset CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以使用 counter-reset CSS属性将计数器的值重置为任意数字。

trans-unit.source: Note: The custom property prefix was var- in the earlier spec, but later changed to --. Firefox 31 and above follow the new spec. (bug 985838)
trans-unit.target: 注意：自定义属性前缀在较早的规范中为 var- ，但后来更改为 -- 。Firefox 31及更高版本遵循新规范。（错误985838）

trans-unit.source: Note: The examples on this page use CSS's @media for illustrative purposes, but the basic syntax remains the same for all types of media queries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此页面上的示例出于说明目的使用CSS的 @media ，但是对于所有类型的媒体查询，基本语法均相同。

trans-unit.source: Note: The final position described by the <position> value does not need to be inside the element's box.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <position> 值描述的最终位置不必在元素框内。

trans-unit.source: Note: The hierarchy of stacking contexts is a subset of the hierarchy of HTML elements because only certain elements create stacking contexts. We can say that elements that do not create their own stacking contexts are assimilated by the parent stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 注意：堆栈上下文的层次结构是HTML元素层次结构的子集，因为只有某些元素会创建堆栈上下文。我们可以说不创建自己的堆栈上下文的元素被父堆栈上下文吸收。

trans-unit.source: Note: The hierarchy of stacking contexts is a subset of the hierarchy of HTML elements, because only certain elements create stacking contexts. We can say that elements that do not create their own stacking contexts are assimilated by the parent stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 注意：堆栈上下文的层次结构是HTML元素层次结构的子集，因为只有某些元素会创建堆栈上下文。可以说，未创建自己的堆栈上下文的元素被父堆栈上下文吸收。

trans-unit.source: Note: The initial value should not be confused with the value specified by the browser's style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿将初始值与浏览器的样式表指定的值混淆。

trans-unit.source: Note: The list of accepted keywords has undergone many changes during the evolution of CSS:
trans-unit.target: 注意：在CSS的发展过程中，可接受关键字的列表发生了许多变化：

trans-unit.source: Note: The outline will be invisible for many elements if its style is not defined. This is because the style defaults to none. A notable exception is input elements, which are given default styling by browsers.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果未定义轮廓样式，则对于许多元素而言，轮廓将不可见。这是因为样式默认为 none 。 input 元素是一个显着的例外，浏览器将其设置为默认样式。

trans-unit.source: Note: The outline will be invisible if its style is not defined. This is because the style defaults to none.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果未定义轮廓，则轮廓将不可见。这是因为样式默认为 none 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The position can be set so that the replaced element is drawn outside its box.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以设置位置，以便将替换的元素绘制在其框的外部。

trans-unit.source: Note: The property names in this index do not include the JavaScript names where they differ from the CSS standard names.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此索引中的属性名称与CSS标准名称不同时不包括JavaScript名称。

trans-unit.source: Note: The pseudo-elements generated by ::before and ::after are contained by the element's formatting box, and thus don't apply to replaced elements such as <img>, or to <br> elements.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所生成的伪元素由 ::before 和 ::after 被由元素的格式化盒包含，因此并不适用于替换元素如 <img> ，或者 <br> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: The rules defining how hyphenation is performed are not explicitly defined by the specification, so the exact hyphenation may vary from browser to browser.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范没有明确定义执行连字符的规则，因此确切的连字符可能因浏览器而异。

trans-unit.source: Note: The screenshots below show the expected rendering. Not all browsers currently render these correctly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：以下屏幕截图显示了预期的渲染。当前，并非所有浏览器都能正确呈现这些内容。

trans-unit.source: Note: The specification doesn't define how borders of different styles connect in the corners.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范没有定义不同样式的边框在角落如何连接。

trans-unit.source: Note: The syntax of the fallback, like that of custom properties, allows commas. For example, var(--foo, red, blue) defines a fallback of red, blue; that is, anything between the first comma and the end of the function is considered a fallback value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：后备的语法与自定义属性的语法一样，允许使用逗号。例如， var(--foo, red, blue) 限定的回退 red, blue ; 也就是说，第一个逗号到函数结尾之间的任何内容都被视为后备值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The values optimizeQuality and optimizeSpeed present in an early draft (and coming from its SVG counterpart image-rendering) are defined as synonyms for the smooth and pixelated values respectively.
trans-unit.target: 注意：早期草稿中存在的值 optimizeQuality 和 optimizeSpeed （来自其SVG对应的 image-rendering ）分别定义为 smooth 值和 pixelated 值的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Note: The values optimizeQuality and optimizeSpeed present in an early draft (and coming from its SVG counterpart) are defined as synonyms for the auto value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：早期草稿中存在的值 optimizeQuality 和 optimizeSpeed （来自其SVG副本）被定义为 auto 值的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is no need to enclose the not operator between two parentheses at the top level. To combine it with other operators, like and and or, the parentheses are required.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不需要在顶层的两个括号之间加上 not 运算符。要将其与其他运算符（例如 and 和 or 结合使用，必须使用括号。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is no official range of valid <integer> values. Opera 12.1 supports values up to 215-1, IE up to 220-1, and other browsers even higher. During the CSS3 Values cycle there was a lot of discussion about setting a minimum range to support: the latest decision, in April 2012 during the LC phase, was [-227-1; 227-1], but other values like 224-1 and 230-1 were also proposed. However, the latest spec doesn't specify a range anymore.
trans-unit.target: 注意：没有有效的 <integer> 值的正式范围。 Opera 12.1支持的值最大为2 15 -1，IE的最大值为2 20 -1，其他浏览器甚至更高。在CSS3价值观周期中，围绕设置最低支持范围进行了大量讨论：2012年4月，LC阶段的最新决定是[-2 27 -1; 2 27 -1]，但还建议使用其他值，例如2 24 -1和2 30 -1 。但是，最新规范不再指定范围。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is no official range of valid <integer> values. Opera 12.1 supports values up to 215-1, IE up to 220-1, and other browsers even higher. During the CSS3 Values cycle there was a lot of discussion about setting a minimum range to support: the latest decision, in April 2012 during the LC phase, was [-227-1; 227-1], but other values like 224-1 and 230-1 were also proposed. However, the latest spec doesn't specify a range anymore.

Note: There is variance among browsers regarding behavior when a block element is placed first within a list element declared as list-style-position: inside. Chrome and Safari both place this element on the same line as the marker box, whereas Firefox, Internet Explorer and Opera place it on the next line. For more information on this, see bug 36854.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当块元素首先放置在声明为 list-style-position: inside 的列表元素内时，浏览器之间的行为存在差异。Chrome和Safari都将此元素与标记框放在同一行，而Firefox，Internet Explorer和Opera将该元素放在下一行。有关此的更多信息，请参见错误36854。

trans-unit.source: Note: These properties will only work in Microsoft applications, and are not on a standards track.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这些属性仅在Microsoft应用程序中有效，并且不在标准轨道上。

trans-unit.source: Note: These units, especially em and rem, are often used to create scalable layouts, which maintain the vertical rhythm of the page even when the user changes the font size.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这些单位，尤其是 em 和 rem ，通常用于创建可缩放的布局，即使用户更改字体大小，这些布局也可以保持页面的垂直节奏。

trans-unit.source: Note: This article describes the <color> data type in detail. To learn more about using color in HTML, see Applying color to HTML elements using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 注意：本文详细介绍了 <color> 数据类型。要了解有关在HTML中使用颜色的更多信息，请参见使用CSS将颜色应用于HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: This data type was initially introduced in CSS Level 2 for the now-obsolete auralmedia type, where it was used to define the pitch of the voice. However, the <frequency> data type has been reintroduced in CSS3, though no CSS property is using it at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此数据类型最初是在CSS Level 2中针对现在已经过时的听觉媒体类型引入的，用于定义声音的音高。但是，尽管目前没有CSS属性在CSS3中重新引入了 <frequency> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Note: This data type was initially introduced in CSS Level 2 for the now-obsolete auralmedia type, where it was used to define the pitch of the voice. However, the <frequency> data type has been reintroduced in CSS3, though no CSS property is using it at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此数据类型最初是在CSS Level 2中针对现在已经过时的听觉媒体类型引入的，用于定义声音的音高。但是，虽然目前没有CSS属性在CSS3中重新引入了 <frequency> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Note: This example will only work in browsers that support <percentage> values.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此示例仅在支持 <percentage> 值的浏览器中工作。

trans-unit.source: Note: This feature does not correspond to device orientation. Opening the soft keyboard on many devices in portrait orientation will cause the viewport to become wider than it is tall, thereby causing the browser to use landscape styles instead of portrait.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能与设备方向不符。以纵向方式在许多设备上打开软键盘会导致视口变得比高度高，从而导致浏览器使用横向样式而不是纵向样式。

trans-unit.source: Note: This feature is not intended to be used by Web sites. To achieve reflection on the Web, the standard way is to use the CSS element() function.
trans-unit.target: 注意：网站不打算使用此功能。为了在Web上实现反射，标准方法是使用CSS element() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Note: This feature is not supported by any user agent and its specifics are subject to change.
trans-unit.target: 注意：任何用户代理均不支持此功能，其具体细节可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function is similar to the more established opacity property. The difference is that with filters, some browsers provide hardware acceleration for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能类似于已建立的 opacity 属性。不同之处在于，使用过滤器后，某些浏览器可提供硬件加速以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function is somewhat similar to the box-shadow property. The box-shadow property creates a rectangular shadow behind an element's entire box, while the drop-shadow() filter function creates a shadow that conforms to the shape (alpha channel) of the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能有点类似于 box-shadow 属性。所述 box-shadow 属性创建后面的元件的矩形阴影整个框，而 drop-shadow() 滤波器函数创建的阴影符合形状（alpha通道）图像本身。

trans-unit.source: Note: This list is incomplete. For more CSS properties see The main CSS reference and Mozilla CSS Extensions. The reference articles also include examples on how to use all the properties.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此列表不完整。有关更多CSS属性，请参见主要CSS参考和Mozilla CSS扩展。参考文章还包括有关如何使用所有属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: Note: This media type has been deprecated in favor of speech.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不建议使用此媒体类型，而建议使用 speech 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property doesn't work for XUL <xul:textbox> elements, because the textbox itself never takes focus. Instead, XBL creates an anonymous HTML <input> element inside the textbox, and that element is what receives focus. You can stop the textbox from taking keyboard focus by setting its tab index to -1, and from taking mouse focus by preventing the default action of mousedown events.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性不适用于XUL <xul:textbox> 元素，因为 textbox 本身永远不会获得焦点。相反，XBL在 textbox 框内创建了一个匿名HTML <input> 元素，该元素就是获得焦点的元素。您可以通过将 textbox 的选项卡索引设置为 -1 来阻止文本框获取键盘焦点，并通过阻止 mousedown 事件的默认操作阻止文本框获取鼠标焦点。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property doesn't work for XUL textbox elements, because the textbox itself never takes focus. Instead, XBL creates an anonymous HTML <input> element inside the textbox, and that element is what receives focus. You can stop the textbox from taking keyboard focus by setting its tab index to -1, and from taking mouse focus by preventing the default action of mousedown events.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性不适用于XUL textbox 元素，因为 textbox 本身永远不会获得焦点。取而代之的是，XBL 在 textbox 框内创建一个匿名HTML <input> 元素，该元素就是获得焦点的元素。您可以通过将 textbox 的选项卡索引设置为 -1 来阻止文本框获取键盘焦点，并通过阻止 mousedown 事件的默认操作阻止文本框获取鼠标焦点。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property is applied to list items, i.e. elements with display: list-item;by default this includes <li> elements. Because this property is inherited, it can be set on the parent element (normally <ol> or <ul>) to let it apply to all list items.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性适用于列表项，即具有 display: list-item; 元素的元素。默认情况下，这包括 <li> 元素。由于此属性是继承的，因此可以在父元素（通常为 <ol> 或 <ul> ）上进行设置，以使其应用于所有列表项。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property is applied to list items, i.e., elements with display: list-item; . By default this includes <li> elements. Because this property is inherited, it can be set on a parent element (normally <ol> or <ul>) to make the same list styling apply to all the items inside.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性应用于列表项，即具有 display: list-item; 元素。。默认情况下，这包括 <li> 元素。由于此属性是继承的，因此可以在父元素（通常为 <ol> 或 <ul> ）上进行设置，以使相同的列表样式适用于其中的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property is applied to list items, i.e., elements with display: list-item;. By default this includes <li> elements. Because this property is inherited, it can be set on the parent element (normally <ol> or <ul>) to let it apply to all list items.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性适用于列表项，即具有 display: list-item; 元素的元素。。默认情况下，这包括 <li> 元素。由于此属性是继承的，因此可以在父元素（通常为 <ol> 或 <ul> ）上进行设置，以使其应用于所有列表项。

trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性供文档类型定义（DTD）设计人员使用。Web设计人员和类似作者不应覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Note: This pseudo-class applies only to the focused element itself. Use :focus-within if you want to select an element that contains a focused element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此伪类仅适用于焦点元素本身。如果要选择包含焦点元素的元素，请使用 :focus-within 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This pseudo-class can be used to change only the margin, padding, border, and background properties of the page box. All other properties will be ignored, and only the page box, not the document content on the page, will be affected.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此伪类可用于仅更改页面框的 margin ， padding ， border 和 background 属性。所有其他属性都将被忽略，并且仅页面框而不是页面上的文档内容将受到影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: This pseudo-class is essentially the same as :nth-child, except it counts items backwards from the end, not forwards from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该伪类与 :nth-child 基本上相同，除了它从末尾开始计数而不是从头开始计数。

trans-unit.source: Note: This pseudo-class is essentially the same as :nth-of-type, except it counts items backwards from the end, not forwards from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该伪类与 :nth-of-type 本质上相同，除了它从末尾开始计数而不是从头开始计数。

trans-unit.source: Note: This pseudo-class only applies to elements that have (and can take) a range limitation. In the absence of such a limitation, the element can neither be "in-range" nor "out-of-range."
trans-unit.target: 注意：此伪类仅适用于具有（并且可以采用）范围限制的元素。在没有这种限制的情况下，该元素既不能在“范围内”，也不能在“范围外”。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value was not present in the initial release of Flexible Box Layout, and thus some older implementations will not support it. The equivalent effect can be had by using auto together with a main size (width or height) of auto.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值在“ Flexible Box Layout”的初始发行版中不存在，因此某些较早的实现不支持该值。等同的效果可以通过使用了 auto 与主尺寸（一起宽度或高度的） auto 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though initially similar to the SVG image-rendering attribute, the values are quite different now.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管最初与SVG image-rendering 属性相似，但现在这些值已经大不相同。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though trickier than Cartesian coordinates, homogeneous coordinates in projective geometry lead to 3×3 transformation matrices, and can simply express translations as linear functions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然比笛卡尔坐标复杂，但投影几何中的齐次坐标会导致3×3变换矩阵，并且可以简单地将平移表示为线性函数。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though trickier than Cartesian coordinates, homogeneous coordinates in projective geometry lead to 3x3 transformation matrices, and can simply express translations as linear functions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然比笛卡尔坐标复杂，但投影几何中的齐次坐标会导致3x3变换矩阵，并且可以简单地将平移表示为线性函数。

trans-unit.source: Note: To make words break within themselves, use overflow-wrap, word-break, or hyphens instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要使单词在自己内部打断，请改用 overflow-wrap ， word-break 或 hyphens 。

trans-unit.source: Note: To maximize accessibility, it is generally best to use values that are relative to the user's default font size.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了最大程度地提高可访问性，通常最好使用相对于用户默认字体大小的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unless the image has a specified height and width the broken image icon will not be displayed but the alt attribute will also be hidden if -moz-force-broken-image-icon is set to 1.

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike rotations in the 2D plane, the composition of 3D rotations is usually not commutative. In other words, the order in which the rotations are applied impacts the result.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与2D平面中的旋转不同，3D旋转的组成通常不是可交换的。换句话说，施加旋转的顺序会影响结果。

trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 16之前，Gecko接受 a4 ， b4 和 c4 的 <length> 值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using ::-moz-range-thumb with anything but an <input type="range"> doesn't match anything and has no effect.

trans-unit.source: Note: When grid first shipped in browsers the column-gap, row-gap and gap properties were prefixed with the grid- prefix as grid-column-gap, grid-row-gap and grid-gap respectively.
trans-unit.target: 注：当电网在浏览器中第一次运 column-gap ， row-gap 和 gap 性质与前缀 grid- 前缀 grid-column-gap ， grid-row-gap 和 grid-gap 分别。

trans-unit.source: Note: When grid first shipped in browsers the column-gap, row-gap and gap were prefixed with the grid- prefix as grid-column-gap, grid-row-gap and grid-gap respectively.

trans-unit.source: Note: When using HTTP/2, it may in fact be more bandwidth-friendly to use multiple small requests.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用HTTP / 2时，实际上使用多个小请求可能对带宽更友好。

trans-unit.source: Note: Whenever possible, Web authors should instead use the font-variant shorthand property or an associated longhand property such as font-variant-ligatures, font-variant-caps, font-variant-east-asian, font-variant-alternates, font-variant-numeric or font-variant-position.
trans-unit.target: 注意：只要有可能，Web作者就应该使用 font-variant 速记属性或相关的longhand属性，例如 font-variant-ligatures ， font-variant-caps ， font-variant-east-asian ， font-variant-alternates ， font-variant-numeric 或 font-variant-position 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Where possible, authors are encouraged to use the newer clip-path property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在可能的情况下，鼓励作者改用较新的 clip-path 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: While user agents may use currentcolor (which is usually animatable) for the auto value, auto is not interpolated in transitions and animations.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然用户代理可以将 currentcolor （通常是可动画的）用于 auto 值，但 auto 不会插值到过渡和动画中。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can explicitly specify the initial value by using the initial keyword.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以使用 initial 关键字显式指定初始值。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can only specify the explicit or the implicit grid properties in a single grid declaration. The sub-properties you don’t specify are set to their initial value, as normal for shorthands. Also, the gutter properties are NOT reset by this shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您只能在单个 grid 声明中指定显式或隐式网格属性。与速记一样，未指定的子属性将设置为其初始值。同样，该快捷方式不会重置装订线属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can't change all CSS properties with this pseudo-class. You can only change the margins, orphans, widows, and page breaks of the document. Furthermore, you may only use absolute-length units when defining the margins. All other properties will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能使用此伪类更改所有CSS属性。您只能更改文档的页边距， orphans ， widows 和分页符。此外，定义边距时只能使用绝对长度单位。所有其他属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note: You need to install the OpenType font Leitura Display Swashes for this example to work. You can find a few free versions for testing purposes, for example from fontsgeek.com.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您需要安装OpenType字体Leitura Display Swashes，此示例才能正常工作。您可以找到一些用于测试目的的免费版本，例如，从fontsgeek.com。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should specify a border-style in case the border image fails to load. Indeed, this is required according to the specification, although not all browsers implement it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您应该指定 border-style ，以防边框图像无法加载。实际上，根据规范，这是必需的，尽管并非所有浏览器都可以实现。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should specify a separate border-style in case the border image fails to load. Indeed, this is required according to the specification, although not all browsers implement this requirement.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果边框图像无法加载，则应指定单独的 border-style 。实际上，根据规范，这是必需的，尽管并非所有浏览器都可以实现此要求。

trans-unit.source: Note: You shouldn't rely on disabling IME to prevent extended characters from passing through your form. Even with IME disabled, users can still paste extended characters into your form's fields.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不应该依赖于禁用IME来防止扩展字符通过您的表单。即使禁用了IME，用户仍可以将扩展字符粘贴到表单的字段中。

trans-unit.source: Note: in case both flex-basis (other than auto) and width (or height in case of flex-direction: column) are set for an element, flex-basis has priority.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果同时为元素设置了 flex-basis （不是 auto ）和 width （或 height ，如果是 flex-direction: column 则为高度），那么 flex-basis 具有优先权。

trans-unit.source: Note: juxtaposition has precedence over the double ampersand, meaning that bold thin && <length> is equivalent to [ bold thin ] && <length>. It describes bold thin <length> or <length> bold thin but not bold <length> thin.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并置优先于双“＆”号，这意味着 bold thin && <length> 等效于 [ bold thin ] && <length> 。它描述了 bold thin <length> 或 <length> bold thin 但没有描述 bold <length> thin 。

trans-unit.source: Note: the double ampersand has precedence over the double bar, meaning that bold || thin && <length> is equivalent to bold || [ thin && <length> ]. It describes bold, thin <length>, bold thin <length>, or thin <length> bold but not <length> bold thin as bold, if not omitted, must be placed before or after the whole thin && <length> component.
trans-unit.target: 注意：双“＆”号优先于双杠，表示 bold || thin && <length> 等效于 bold || [ thin && <length> ] 。它描述了 bold ， thin <length> ， bold thin <length> 或 thin <length> bold 但不是 <length> bold thin 因为如果没有省略，则必须将它们放置在整个 thin && <length> 组件之前或之后。

trans-unit.source: Note: the double bar has precedence over the single bar, meaning that bold | thin || <length> is equivalent to bold | [ thin || <length> ]. It describes bold, thin, <length>, <length> thin, or thin <length> but not bold <length> as only one entity from each side of the | combinator can be present.
trans-unit.target: 注意：双杠优先于单杠，这意味着 bold | thin || <length> 等同于 bold | [ thin || <length> ] 。它描述了 bold ， thin ， <length> ， <length> thin 或 thin <length> 但没有将 bold <length> 为 | 可以存在组合器。

trans-unit.source: Note: there is no set specific value for the upper-end degree measurement in this case; they simply indicate that there is an axis so the browser can know to render upright or italic (remember that italics are only on or off)
trans-unit.target: 注意：在这种情况下，高端度测量没有设置特定的值；它们只是表示存在一个轴，因此浏览器可以知道渲染竖线还是斜体（请记住，斜体仅处于打开或关闭状态）

trans-unit.source: Note: this property is in progress of being replaced by the more generic break-after. This new property also handles column and region breaks and is syntactically compatible with page-break-after.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性正在被更通用的 break-after 代替。此新属性还处理列和区域中断，并且在语法上与 page-break-after 兼容。

trans-unit.source: Note: this property is in progress of being replaced by the more generic break-before. This new property also handles column and region breaks and is syntactically compatible with page-break-before.

trans-unit.source: Note:Proximity of elements in the document tree has no effect on the specificity.

trans-unit.target: 注意：HTML实体（例如   或 — ）不能在CSS <string> 中使用。

trans-unit.source: Note:User agents must use the potentially CORS-enabled fetch method defined by the HTML5 specification for all URLs in a shape-outside value. When fetching, user agents must use "Anonymous" mode, set the referrer source to the stylesheet's URL, and set the origin to the URL of the containing document. If this results in network errors such that there is no valid fallback image, the effect is as if the value none had been specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用户代理必须使用HTML5规范定义的可能启用了CORS的获取方法，以对所有 shape-outside URL使用URL 。提取时，用户代理必须使用“匿名”模式，将引荐来源设置为样式表的URL，并将来源设置为包含文档的URL。如果这导致网络错误，从而导致没有有效的后备映像，则效果就像 none 指定任何值一样。

trans-unit.source: Note:<shape> and rect() work in conjunction with clip, which has been deprecated in favor of clip-path. When possible, use clip-path and the <basic-shape> data type instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <shape> 和 rect() 与 clip 一起使用，已经弃用了 clip-path 。如果可能，请改用 clip-path 和 <basic-shape> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Note:-moz-user-input was one of the proposals leading to the proposed CSS 3 user-input property, which has not yet reached Candidate Recommendation (call for implementations). A similar property, user-focus, was proposed in early drafts of a predecessor of the CSS3 UI specification, but was rejected by the working group.
trans-unit.target: 注意： -moz-user-input 是导致提议的CSS 3 user-input 属性的提议之一，该属性尚未达到候选推荐标准（要求实现）。在CSS3 UI规范的前身的早期草稿中提出了类似的属性，即以 user-focus ，但遭到工作组的拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Note:-moz-user-input was one of the proposals leading to the proposed CSS 3 user-input property, which has not yet reached Candidate Recommendation (call for implementations). A similar property, user-focus, was proposed in early drafts of a predecessor of the CSS3 UI specification, but was rejected by the working group.

Note:::selection was in drafts of CSS Selectors Level 3, but it was removed in the Candidate Recommendation phase because its was under-specified (especially with nested elements) and interoperability wasn't achieved (based on discussion in the W3C Style mailing list). It returned in Pseudo-Elements Level 4.
trans-unit.target: 注意 ::selection 在CSS Selectors Level 3的草稿中，但是在候选推荐阶段中被删除了，因为它的指定不足（尤其是带有嵌套元素）并且没有实现互操作性（基于W3C样式邮件中的讨论）清单）。它以Pseudo-Elements Level 4返回。

trans-unit.source: Note:::selection was in drafts of CSS Selectors Level 3, but it was removed in the Candidate Recommendation phase because its was under-specified (especially with nested elements) and interoperability wasn't achieved (based on discussion in the W3C Style mailing list). It returned in Pseudo-Elements Level 4.
Note::matches() was renamed to :is() in CSSWG issue #3258.

trans-unit.target: 注意： matrix(a, b, c, d, tx, ty) 是 matrix3d(a, b, 0, 0, c, d, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, tx, ty, 0, 1) ，tx，ty的简写， 0，1）。

trans-unit.source: Note: initial and unset are not supported in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Internet Explorer不支持 initial 和未 unset 。

trans-unit.source: Note: order is only meant to affect the visual order of elements and not their logical or tab order. order must not be used on non-visual media such as speech.
trans-unit.target: 注意： order 仅是为了影响元素的视觉顺序，而不是其逻辑顺序或制表符顺序。 order 不得在非视觉媒体（例如语音）上使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: space-* values not supported in older syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：旧语法不支持 space-* 值。

trans-unit.source: Note: style containment is "at-risk" in the spec and may not be supported everywhere (it's not currently supported in Firefox).
trans-unit.target: 注意： style 包含在规范中是“有风险的”，可能并非在所有地方都受支持（Firefox当前不支持）。

trans-unit.source: Note: user-select is not an inherited property, though the initial auto value makes it behave like it is inherited most of the time. WebKit/Chromium-based browsers do implement the property as inherited, which violates the behavior described in the spec, and this will bring some issues. Until now, Chromium chooses to fix the issues, make the final behavior meets the specifications.
trans-unit.target: 注意： user-select 不是继承的属性，尽管初始 auto 值使它的行为像大多数情况下都是继承的。基于WebKit / Chromium的浏览器确实实现了继承的属性，这违反了规范中描述的行为，这会带来一些问题。到目前为止，Chromium选择修复问题，使最终行为符合规范。

trans-unit.source: Note: A computed value other than none results in the creation of a new stacking context the same way that CSS opacity does for values other than 1.
trans-unit.target: 注：以外的计算值 none 在创造一个新的结果堆叠内容相同的方式，CSS opacity 确实为1以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: A computed value other than none results in the creation of a new stacking context the same way that CSS opacity does for values other than 1.
trans-unit.target: 注意：计算值除 none 导致创建新的堆栈上下文，这与CSS opacity 对除 1 以外的值的处理方式相同。

trans-unit.source: Note: An empty <input> does not count as out of range, and will not be selected using the :out-of-range pseudo-class selector. The :blank pseudo-class exists to select blank inputs, although at the time of writing this is experimental and not well-supported. You could also use the required attribute and the :invalid pseudo-class to provide more general logic and styling for making inputs mandatory (:invalid will style blank and out-of-range inputs).
trans-unit.target: 注意：空的 <input> 不会超出范围，并且不会使用 :out-of-range 伪类选择器进行选择。该 :blank 伪类存在选择空白的投入，虽然在写作的时候，这是实验并不能很好地支持。您也可以使用 required 属性和 :invalid 伪类来提供更通用的逻辑和样式，以使输入成为强制性（ :invalid 将设置空白和超出范围的输入的样式）。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of CSS Colors Level 4, hsla() is an alias for hsl(). In browsers that implement the Level 4 standard, they accept the same parameters and behave the same way.
trans-unit.target: 注：作为的CSS颜色等级4， hsla() 是一个别名 hsl() 。在实现第4级标准的浏览器中，它们接受相同的参数并以相同的方式运行。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of Firefox 63, Firefox is the only browser to have implemented the gap properties for Flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Firefox 63开始，Firefox是唯一实现Flexbox间隙属性的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Note: As originally defined, the selected element had to have a parent. Beginning with Selectors Level 4, this is no longer required.
trans-unit.target: 注意：按照最初的定义，所选元素必须具有父级。从选择器级别4开始，这不再是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note: At the time of writing (May 2018), there is no real support for the box alignment properties in block layout. This document details how the specification expects these properties to be implemented for completeness, and is likely to change as the specification and browser implementations develop.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在撰写本文时（2018年5月），在块布局中对框对齐属性没有真正的支持。本文档详细说明了规范如何期望为完整性而实现这些属性，并且可能会随着规范和浏览器实现的发展而发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Note: Boxes are often referred to by their display type — e.g. a box generated by an element with display: block is called a "block box" or just a "block". Note however that block boxes, block-level boxes and box containers are all subtly different; see the Block boxes section below for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：框通常以其显示类型来指称-例如，由具有 display: block 的元素生成的框称为“块框”或简称为“块”。但是请注意，块盒，块级盒和盒容器都存在细微差别。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的“阻止框”部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: Browsers that support the two value syntax, on finding the inner value only, such as when display: flex or display: grid is specified, will set their outer value to block. This will result in expected behavior; for example if you specify an element to be display: grid, you would expect that the box created on the grid container would be a block level box.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在查找内部值时（例如，当指定 display: flex 或 display: grid 时），支持两种值语法的浏览器会将其外部值设置为 block 。这将导致预期的行为；例如，如果您指定要 display: grid 的元素：grid，则您希望在网格容器上创建的框将是块级框。

trans-unit.source: Note: Browsers that support the two value syntax, on finding the outer value only, such as when display: block or display: inline is specified, will set the inner value to flow. This will result in expected behavior; for example if you specify an element to be block, you would expect that the children of that element would participate in block and inline normal flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在查找外部值时（例如，当指定 display: block 或 display: inline 时），支持两个值语法的浏览器会将内部值设置为 flow 。这将导致预期的行为；例如，如果您指定一个要阻止的元素，则您希望该元素的子元素参与阻止和内联常规流布局。

trans-unit.source: Note: CSS versions 1 and 2 were a single monolithic specification where all of CSS was defined in one large document. As CSS became a more feature rich language, maintaining one huge specification became problematic, with different parts of CSS moving on at different speeds. CSS was therefore modularised, and the various CSS Specifications are different modules that make up CSS today. These modules relate to each other, and are at different stages of development.
trans-unit.target: 注意：CSS版本1和2是单个整体规范，其中所有CSS都在一个大型文档中定义。随着CSS成为一种功能更丰富的语言，维护一个庞大的规范变得有问题，CSS的不同部分以不同的速度前进。因此，CSS已被模块化，并且各种CSS规范是当今组成CSS的不同模块。这些模块相互关联，并且处于不同的开发阶段。

trans-unit.source: Note: Custom property names are case sensitive — --my-color will be treated as a separate custom property to --My-color.
trans-unit.target: 注：自定义属性名称是区分大小写的- --my-color 将被视为一个单独的自定义属性 --My-color 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Developers tend to use :-moz-focusring to differentiate between the focus state when the user focuses an element via a mouse click versus keyboard tabbing. It is also potentially useful if you are creating a custom element and you want to change its style based on its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 注意：开发人员倾向于使用 :-moz-focusring 来区分用户通过鼠标单击或键盘标签聚焦元素时的 focus 状态。如果要创建自定义元素，并且想根据其行为来更改其样式，它也可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Early versions of the spec called this property motion-path. It was changed to offset-path because the property describe static positions, not motion.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范的早期版本称为此属性 motion-path 。由于该属性描述的是静态位置而非运动，因此将其更改为 offset-path 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Early versions of the spec called this property motion-rotation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范的早期版本称为此属性 motion-rotation 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Early versions of the spec called this property motion.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范的早期版本称为此属性 motion 。

trans-unit.source: Note: For some years Firefox had a bug whereby it would attempt to follow the visual order and not the source order, making it behave differently to other browsers. This has now been fixed. You should always take the source order as the logical order of the document as all up-to-date user agents will be following the specification and doing so.
trans-unit.target: 注意：几年来，Firefox出现了一个错误，即它会尝试遵循视​​觉顺序而不是源顺序，从而使其行为与其他浏览器不同。现在，此问题已得到解决。您应始终将源顺序作为文档的逻辑顺序，因为所有最新的用户代理都将遵循该规范并遵循该规范。

trans-unit.source: Note: Here we are setting scroll-margin on all sides at once, but only the start edge is really relevant. It would work just as well here to only set a scroll margin on that one edge, for example with scroll-margin-inline-start: 1rem, or scroll-margin: 0 0 0 1rem.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这里我们一次在所有面上设置 scroll-margin ，但是只有开始边缘才是真正相关的。在此处仅在该边缘上设置滚动边距也将同样有效，例如，使用 scroll-margin-inline-start: 1rem 或 scroll-margin: 0 0 0 1rem 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Here we are setting scroll-margin on the start and end of the inline axis (x in our case), but only the end edge is really relevant. It would work just as well here to only set a scroll margin on that one edge, for example with scroll-margin-inline: 0 1rem, or scroll-margin-inline-end: 1rem.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这里我们在内联轴的起点和终点（本例中为x）上设置 scroll-margin ，但实际上只有终点是相关的。在此处仅在该边缘上设置滚动边距也将同样有效，例如，使用 scroll-margin-inline: 0 1rem 或 scroll-margin-inline-end: 1rem ：1rem。

trans-unit.source: Note: In browsers that support the two-value syntax, if no inner value is specified it will default to flow. If no outer value is specified, the principal box will have an outer display type of block.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在支持二值语法的浏览器中，如果未指定内部值，则默认为 flow 。如果未指定外部值，则主体框的外部显示类型为 block 。

trans-unit.source: Note: In the case of this property, markers are only appropriate when drawing SVG shapes involving the use of the marker-* properties (e.g. marker-start) and <marker> element. They do not apply to HTML text, so in that case, you can only determine the order of stroke and fill.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于此属性，仅当绘制涉及使用 marker-* 属性（例如 marker-start ）和 <marker> 元素的SVG形状时，才适合使用标记。它们不适用于HTML文本，因此在这种情况下，您只能确定 stroke 和 fill 的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note: Multi-column Layout predates the Box Alignment specification. and the properties listed here, while specified for Multicol, may not be supported in browsers.
trans-unit.target: 注意：“多列布局”早于“框对齐”规范。并且为Multicol指定了此处列出的属性，但浏览器可能不支持。

trans-unit.source: Note: Not all browsers have implemented the full syntax for font format, so test carefully. All browsers that support variable fonts will still render them if you set the format to just the file format, rather than format-variations (i.e. woff2 instead of woff2-variations), but it’s best to use the proper syntax if possible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并非所有浏览器都实现了字体格式的完整语法，因此请仔细测试。如果将格式设置为仅文件格式而不是格式变体（即 woff2 而不是 woff2-variations ），则所有支持可变字体的浏览器仍将呈现它们，但是，如果可能的话，最好使用适当的语法。

trans-unit.source: Note: Registered axis tags are identified using lower-case tags, whereas custom axes should be given upper-case tags. Note that font designers aren't forced follow this practice in any way, and some won't. The important takeaway here is that axis tags are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 注意：已注册的轴标签使用小写标签标识，而自定义轴应使用大写标签。请注意，字体设计师不会以任何方式被强制遵循，有些则不会。这里重要的一点是，轴标签区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Note: Supplying value ranges for font-weight, font-stretch, and font-style will keep the browser from attempting to render an axis outside that range if you are using the appropriate attribute (i.e. font-weight or font-stretch), but will not block you from supplying an invalid value via font-variation-settings, so use with care.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果使用适当的属性（即 font-weight 或 font-stretch ），则为 font-weight ， font-stretch 和 font-style 提供值范围将使浏览器无法尝试渲染超出该范围的轴，但是不会阻止您通过 font-variation-settings 提供无效的值，因此请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The % symbol is not used when utilizing font-variation-settings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 font-variation-settings 时不使用％符号。

trans-unit.source: Note: The background-position property also accepts a three-value syntax. This is not allowed in other properties that use <position>.
trans-unit.target: 注意： background-position 属性还接受三值语法。在使用 <position> 的其他属性中不允许这样做。

trans-unit.source: Note: The :hover pseudo-class is problematic on touchscreens. Depending on the browser, the :hover pseudo-class might never match, match only for a moment after touching an element, or continue to match even after the user has stopped touching and until the user touches another element. Web developers should make sure that content is accessible on devices with limited or non-existent hovering capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 注意：： :hover 伪类在触摸屏上有问题。取决于浏览器， :hover 伪类可能永远不匹配，仅在触摸一个元素之后匹配一次，或者甚至在用户停止触摸之后甚至在用户触摸另一个元素之前仍继续匹配。Web开发人员应确保在具有有限悬停功能或不存在悬停功能的设备上可以访问内容。

trans-unit.source: Note: The mask-border page features a working example (using the out-of-date prefixed border mask properties supported in Chromium), so you can get an idea of the effect.

trans-unit.source: Note: The transitionend event doesn't fire if the transition is aborted before the transition is completed because either the element is made display: none or the animating property's value is changed.

trans-unit.source: Note: The CSS Working Group are currently trying to decide what to do about the four-value shorthands for logical properties, for example the equivalents to setting four physical properties at once, like margins with the margin property. We would need some kind of modifier if we were to reuse margin for flow-relative properties. If you would like to read the suggestions or comment on them the relevant GitHub issue is #1282.
trans-unit.target: 注意：CSS工作组当前正在尝试决定如何处理逻辑属性的四值简写，例如，等效于一次设置四个物理属性，例如使用 margin 属性设置margin。如果要为流量相对属性重用 margin ，则需要某种修饰符。如果您想阅读建议或对其进行评论，则相关的GitHub问题是＃1282。

trans-unit.target: 注意：即使将 overflow 设置为 hidden ，JavaScript Element.scrollTop 属性也可用于滚动HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: The alignment properties in Flexbox have been placed into their own specification — CSS Box Alignment Level 3. It is expected that this spec will ultimately supersede the properties as defined in Flexbox Level One.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Flexbox中的对齐属性已放入其自己的规范中-CSS Box Alignment Level 3。预期该规范最终将取代Flexbox Level One中定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The browsers that have implemented the Logical Properties specification have so far implemented the direct mappings and not the new shorthands. Look to the browser compatibility data section on each property page reference for more details.

trans-unit.source: Note: This property is a low-level mechanism designed to set variable font features where no other way to enable or access those features exist. You should only use it when no basic properties exist to set those features (e.g. font-weight, font-style).

trans-unit.source: Note: This property was originally implemented in WebKit and has some issues. It got standardized for legacy support. The CSS Overflow Module Level 3 specification also defines a line-clamp property, which is meant to replace this property and avoid its issues.

trans-unit.source: Variable fonts are an evolution of the OpenType font specification that enables many different variations of a typeface to be incorporated into a single file, rather than having a separate font file for every width, weight, or style. They let you access all the variations contained in a given font file via CSS and a single @font-face reference. This article will give you all you need to know to get you started using variable fonts.
trans-unit.target: 可变字体是OpenType字体规范的发展，它允许将许多不同的字体变体合并到单个文件中，而不是针对每种宽度，粗细或样式都具有单独的字体文件。它们使您可以通过CSS和单个 @font-face 引用访问给定字体文件中包含的所有变体。本文将为您提供开始使用可变字体所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.source: Variable fonts are an evolution of the OpenType font specification that enables many different variations of a typeface to be incorporated into a single file, rather than having a separate font file for every width, weight, or style. This article will give you all you need to know to get you started using variable fonts.
trans-unit.target: 可变字体是OpenType字体规范的发展，它允许将许多不同的字体变体合并到单个文件中，而不是针对每种宽度，粗细或样式都具有单独的字体文件。本文将为您提供开始使用可变字体所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Current implementations in most browsers will remove any element with display: contents from the accessibility tree (but descendants will remain). This will cause the element itself to no longer be announced by screen reading technology. This is incorrect behavior according to the specification, see display: contents.
trans-unit.target: 警告：在大多数浏览器中，当前的实现会从可访问性树中删除所有带有 display: contents 元素（但后代将保留）。这将导致屏幕阅读技术不再宣布该元素本身。根据规范，这是不正确的行为，请参见 display: contents 。

trans-unit.source: Warning: In order to use variable fonts on your operating system, you need to make sure that it is up to date. For example Linux OSes need the latest Linux Freetype version, and macOS prior to 10.13 does not support variable fonts. If your operating system is not up to date, you will not be able to use variable fonts in web pages or the Firefox Developer Tools.
trans-unit.target: 警告：为了在操作系统上使用可变字体，您需要确保它是最新的。例如，Linux操作系统需要最新的Linux Freetype版本，而10.13之前的macOS不支持可变字体。如果您的操作系统不是最新的，则将无法在网页或Firefox开发人员工具中使用可变字体。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Use of display: contents will also remove the element from the accessibility tree – screen readers will not see what's inside, just the same as if you used display: none. Use of contents should only be for presentational, not content, elements.
trans-unit.target: 警告：使用 display: contents 也会从可访问性树中删除该元素–屏幕阅读器将看不到其中的内容，就像使用 display: none 。 contents 使用仅应用于表述元素，而不是内容元素。

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: A 300px × 150px rectangle
trans-unit.target: 300px×150px的矩形

trans-unit.source: A <length> representing the z-component of the translating vector. A positive value moves the element towards the viewer, and a negative value farther away.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 表示平移矢量的z分量。正值将元素移向查看者，负值将元素移远。

trans-unit.source: A <number> representing the abscissa of the scaling vector.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 表示所述缩放向量的横坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <number> representing the ordinate of the scaling vector. If not defined, its default value is sx, resulting in a uniform scaling that preserves the element's aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 表示所述缩放向量的纵坐标。如果未定义，则其默认值为 sx ，从而产生均匀的缩放比例，从而保留元素的长宽比。

trans-unit.source: A <number> representing the ordinate of the scaling vector. If not defined, its default value is sx, resulting in a uniform scaling that preserves the element's aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 表示所述缩放向量的纵坐标。如果未定义，则其默认值为 sx ，从而导致均匀缩放，从而保留元素的长宽比。

trans-unit.source: A <number> value between 1 and 1000, inclusive. Higher numbers represent weights that are bolder than (or as bold as) lower numbers. Certain commonly used values correspond to common weight names, as described in the Common weight name mapping section below.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 1到1000之间的值，包括端值。较高的数字表示的权重比较低的数字大（或大胆）。某些常用值对应于通用权重名称，如下面“通用权重名称映射”部分所述。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage> value between 50% and 200% (inclusive). Negative values are not allowed for this property.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <percentage> 50％和200％（含）之间的值。此属性不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: A <border-radius> value in inset() is computed as an expanded list of all eight <length> or percentage values.
trans-unit.target: inset() 中的 <border-radius> 值被计算为所有八个 <length> 或百分比值的扩展列表。

trans-unit.source: A <color value>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <color value> 。

trans-unit.source: A contain value of paint (e.g. contain: paint;)
trans-unit.target: paint 的 contain 值（例如， contain: paint; ）

trans-unit.source: A counter has no visible effect by itself. The counter() function (and counters() function) is what makes it useful by returning developer defined strings (or images).
trans-unit.target: 一个计数器有本身没有明显的效果。该 counter() 函数（和 counters() 函数）是什么使得它有用通过返回开发人员定义字符串（或图像）。

trans-unit.source: A counter has no visible effect by itself. The counters() function (and counter() function) is what makes it useful by returning developer defined content.
trans-unit.target: 一个计数器有本身没有明显的效果。该 counters() 函数（和 counter() 函数）是什么使得它有用通过返回开发人员定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <dimension> is a <number> with a unit attached to it, for example 45deg, 100ms, or 10px. The attached unit identifier is case insensitive. There is never a space or any other characters between a the number and the unit identifier: i.e. 1 cm is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <dimension> 是 <number> 具有连接到其上的单元，例如 45deg ， 100ms ，或 10px 的。附加的单位标识符不区分大小写。数字和单位标识符之间绝不能有空格或其他任何字符：即 1 cm 无效。

trans-unit.source: A filter value other than none or a will-change value of filter (only works on Firefox).
trans-unit.target: 一个 filter 值比其他 none 或 will-change 的值 filter （仅适用于Firefox浏览器）。

trans-unit.source: A font-stretch value. Since Firefox 61 (and in other modern browsers) this also accepts two values to specify a range that is supported by a font-face, for example font-stretch: 50% 200%;
trans-unit.target: 甲 font-stretch 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如 font-stretch: 50% 200%;

trans-unit.source: A font-style value. Since Firefox 61 (and in other modern browsers) this also accepts two values to specify a range that is supported by a font-face, for example font-style: oblique 20deg 50deg;
trans-unit.target: 一 font-style 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如， font-style: oblique 20deg 50deg;

trans-unit.source: A font-variant value.
trans-unit.target: 甲 font-variant 值。

trans-unit.source: A font-weight value. Since Firefox 61 (and in other modern browsers) this also accepts two values to specify a range that is supported by a font-face, for example font-weight: 100 400;
trans-unit.target: 甲 font-weight 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如 font-weight: 100 400;

trans-unit.source: A <gradient> data type
trans-unit.target: 甲 <gradient> 数据类型

trans-unit.source: A CSSpseudo-class is a keyword added to a selector that specifies a special state of the selected element(s). For example, :hover can be used to change a button's color when the user's pointer hovers over it.
trans-unit.target: 甲CSS 伪类是添加到选择一个关键字，它指定所选择的元件（一个或多个）的一个特殊状态。例如，当用户的指针悬停在按钮上时， :hover 可用于更改按钮的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A CSSlayout mode, sometimes simply called layout, is an algorithm that determines the position and size of boxes based on the way they interact with their sibling and ancestor boxes. There are several of them:
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS 布局模式，有时简称布局，是一个算法来决定的箱基础上，路的位置和大小，他们相互作用与他们的兄弟姐妹和祖先盒。其中有几个：

trans-unit.source: A description of which properties are animatable is available; it's worth noting that this description is also valid for CSS transitions.
trans-unit.target: 有哪些属性可以设置动画的描述。值得注意的是，此描述对于CSS Transitions也有效。

trans-unit.source: A <length> giving the distance from the user to the z=0 plane. It is used to apply a perspective transform to the element and its content. If the value is 0 or a negative number, no perspective transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 从用户到z = 0的平面中给出的距离。它用于对元素及其内容应用透视变换。如果值为 0 或负数，则不应用透视变换。

trans-unit.source: A <length> or <percentage> that specifies a 2D translation, with the same translation along both the X and Y axes. Equivalent to a translate() (2D translation) function with a single value specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定2D平移的 <length> 或 <percentage> ，在X和Y轴上具有相同的平移。等效于指定了单个值的 translate() （2D翻译）函数。

trans-unit.source: A <length> or <percentage>. If the other value is left or right, then this value defines Y, relative to the top edge. If the other value is top or bottom, then this value defines X, relative to the left edge. If both values are <length> or <percentage> values, then the first defines X and the second Y.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 或 <percentage> 。如果另一个值是 left 或 right ，则此值相对于上边缘定义Y。如果另一个值为 top 或 bottom ，则此值定义相对于左边缘的X。如果两个值都是 <length> 或 <percentage> 值，则第一个定义X，第二个定义Y。

trans-unit.source: A <length> or <percentage>. This specifies the X coordinate relative to the left edge, with the Y coordinate set to 50%.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 或 <percentage> 。这将指定相对于左边缘的X坐标，并将Y坐标设置为50％。

trans-unit.source: A <list-style-type> name, <@counter-style> name or symbols() function, where a counter style name is a numeric, alphabetic, or symbolic simple predefined counter style, a complex longhand east Asian or Ethiopic predefined counter style, or other predefined counter style. If omitted, the counter-style defaults to decimal.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <list-style-type> 名， <@counter-style> 名称或 symbols() 函数，其中计数器样式名是一个 numeric ， alphabetic ，或 symbolic 简单预定义计数器样式，一个复杂的普通写法东亚或埃塞俄比亚预定义计数器样式或其他预定义的计数器样式。如果省略，则计数器样式默认为 decimal 。

trans-unit.source: A <number> in the range 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive, or a <percentage> in the range 0% to 100%, inclusive, representing the opacity of the channel (that is, the value of its alpha channel). Any value outside the interval, though valid, is clamped to the nearest limit in the range.
trans-unit.target: 范围在 0.0 到 1.0 之间（包括端点）的 <number> 或范围在 0% 到 100% 之间（包括端点）的 <percentage> ，表示通道的不透明度（即其Alpha通道的值）。间隔之外的任何值（尽管有效）都将被钳位到该范围内的最接近极限。
